channel.title: Aha, we've fooled them all again!
channel.description:
Haha, how many people did we fool this year that BM would be released?
We need to go BIGGER next year!

item.source: Aha, we've fooled them all again!

item.title: Aha, we've fooled them all again!
item.dc:creator: Psyborg
item.description:
Conti:

Successful troll is successful.

Look what you did:

https://www.niubie.com/2011/01/futurologia-black-mesa-source-este-4-de-enero-despues-de-todo/

https://usuariocompulsivo.com/black-mesa-source-llegaria-el-4-de-enero/

https://n4g.com/news/672026/black-mesa-released-to-select-forum-members

https://www.totalgamingnetwork.com/content.php?3834-Rumor-Is-Black-Mesa-Source-Released-!

Okay, I know I’m super late to this party because I only ever drop into these forums to impress everyone with a display of witticism [/sarcasm etc.] or troll gaming journals, but this is p. awesome.

Read full topic
item.source: Aha, we've fooled them all again!

item.title: Aha, we've fooled them all again!
item.dc:creator: BrAndi
item.description:
Metritutus:

Don’t believe anything said by anyone. Ever. To do so would incite the possibility of misinterpretation through truth, or being misled through lies.

Might be difficult to heed your advice, considering you just told me not to.
But don’t worry. I’d rather believe in someone, a living person, that believing his/her word(s).

Read full topic
item.source: Aha, we've fooled them all again!

item.title: Aha, we've fooled them all again!
item.dc:creator: Paddy
item.description:
DiePoente:

Of course it’s not true that selected forum members have got access to the mod. Only selected persons (not normal forummembers) have access to the betatesting.

The main testers will be other developers not involved with content creation as such, for exmaple, concept artists and voice actors.

Read full topic

item.title: Aha, we've fooled them all again!
item.dc:creator: Orpheon
item.description:
So what IS the truth? I’m guessing that the whole “beta testing” thing was just a troll, and that nothing has actually happened? Or is it a double-troll, and a beta actually was released but you’re acting like it was a troll to hide the fact it happened? Or is it a TRIPLE troll - you knew we’d think it was a double troll and that we’d think you really had it, so nothing happened after all. OR-

…wait, Occam’s razor. Dammit, so nothing happened and it was just a prank?

Read full topic
item.source: Aha, we've fooled them all again!

item.title: Aha, we've fooled them all again!
item.dc:creator: BrAndi
item.description:
Ahh, thanks. Well nothing to add except some weird poetry.

Oh, ye unbeknown beta testers,
test for christ’s sake at a faster rate,
test until your fingers blister,
test until your minds degenerate.

Read full topic

item.title: Aha, we've fooled them all again!
item.dc:creator: DiePoente
item.description:
It’s even on the wiki

Wikipedia:

Release

Black Mesa was released to selected site forum members at midnight on New Year’s Eve 2010 for beta testing, prior to a general release expected sometime early 2011.

And everybody believes what’s written on the wiki.
